title: Vice President Sales, General Manager Mexico
content:
Fender Musical Instruments Corporation is a world-famous brand with offices across the globe. An American icon, Fender was born in Southern California and has built a worldwide influence extending beyond the studio and the stage. A Fender is more than an instrument, it’s a cultural symbol that resonates globally.
We are searching for a General Manager, Mexico based Mexico City. This person will be critical as we grow our presence throughout Mexico and LATAM. They will own the P&L for the business in the entire region and be responsible for identifying new revenue opportunities. This person understands the music culture of the area and has their finger on the pulse, they understand the impact our product has on local music.
Essential Functions: 

Oversee the financial performance of the region, managing budgets, forecasts, and ensuring profitability.
Set clear objectives and develop sales strategies to achieve targeted growth in the Mexican market.
Continuously monitor and analyze market trends, competitor activities, and customer preferences to adapt and pivot strategies as necessary.
Build, lead, motivate, and mentor the sales team to consistently achieve and exceed sales targets.
Establish and nurture relationships with key stakeholders, including suppliers, distributors, retailers, and customers.
Collaborate with the supply chain team to ensure optimal stock levels and timely delivery of products.
Additional duties as assigned.

Qualifications:

8+ years of leadership experience managing 5+ direct reports.
Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field. Master’s degree or MBA preferred.
Fluent in Spanish and English. Knowledge of additional languages is a plus
Strong understanding of the Mexican market, culture, and consumer behavior.
Proficient in using CRM systems, sales analytics tools, and Microsoft Office Suite.
Demonstrated history bringing a premium to a new market.
Ability to travel frequently within Mexico and occasionally internationally
Experience with full P&L ownership
Illustrated experience owning growth strategy from top to bottom.
Passion for music.

About Fender Musical Instruments:
Fender Musical Instruments Corporation (FMIC) is one of the world’s leading musical instrument manufacturers, marketers and distributors, whose portfolio of brands includes Fender®, Squier®, Presonus®, Gretsch®, Jackson®, EVH®, Charvel®, Bigsby®, and Groove Tubes®, among others. For more information, visit www.fender.com. FMIC offers a competitive benefits package which includes medical, dental, 401(k), paid time off, and an equipment purchase program to help you get the band back together. Fender Musical Instruments Corporation is an equal opportunity employer and considers qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, gender, age, color, religion, disability, veterans’ status, sexual orientation, or any other protected factor.
